content: wish you were here socks like postcard from your favourite trip these shortie socks are the perfect pattern to knit while on vacation or with a special skein of yarn picked up in your travels for me knitting projects are always infused with memories of the place and time i spent knitting on them and none more so than summer knitting projects whether you re on the beach camping at the cottage or in your own backyard wish you were here socks are a fun and simple knit with a super easy-to-memorize lace pattern these socks knit up in no time and are a great stash buster too so gather round the campfire and knit along with me size approx foot circumference yarn small medium comfy cozy knits luxury sock in fusion 7 5 inches or 19 cm 8½ inches or 22 cm 80% superwash merino 20% nylon needles 379 m 420 yd 115 g 2 25 mm or us 1 double pointed needles notions set of 5 tapestry needle stitch marker optional or your preferred needles for knitting in the round or on gauge 2 circular needles 32 stitches = approx 10 cm unblocked ___________________________________________________________________________ the pattern is written to be knit with dpns but can be adapted for knitting on circular needles or magic loop if you prefer ready to cast on let s go cast on 56 64 stitches using the long tail cast on method distribute evenly on 4 needles you should have 14 16 stitches on each needle join in the round carefully making sure you don t twist any stitches cuff k1 p1 for 10 rounds note that the lace pattern is only knit on one side of the sock so instructions are different for the right sock and the left sock for both sizes repeat rounds 1-6 of written instructions below on all 4 needles front and back of sock for a total of 4 times before moving to the heel section tip you can knit more or fewer repeats of the pattern depending on how long you want your sock to be but be sure to end after round 6 2 © the kitchen sink shop written instructions for right sock round 1 k 56
